item.description:
Greetings, members of the Salem meditation group.
This is an invitation for you to join Subhash Mahajan in the
Spiritual Awareness Series that is scheduled
for Fridays from 7:00-9:00 p.m. at A Higher Balance Healing Center in Salem, MA.
These evening programs are held on a donations basis.
Please note: Sunday meditations with Judy will continue, as always, from 5-6 p.m.
Subhash is a devoted student and teacher of the Kriya Yoga tradition as taught by
Roy Eugene Davis.
Subash speaks on various topics. This month the talks are as follows:
5/14: Experience Inner Freedom by Knowing our True Self
5/21: Manifesting True Prosperity
5/28: Experience Self-Knowledge through Inner Contemplation
The evenings will also include meditation in the Kriya Yoga tradition.
More programs will be held in June, also on Fridays 7-9 p.m. These topics will
be announced soon.
RSVPs encouraged but walk-ins welcome.
Subhash has taught meditation methods for many
years in the Boston area. Website: www.csaboston.com

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Spiritual Awareness Series with Subhash
